officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double Blind, Saline Placebo and Active Controlled, Multicenter Study of HTX 011 Via Local Administration for Postoperative Analgesia and Decreased Opioid Use Following Unilateral Simple Bunionectomy
summary: This is a Phase 3, randomized, double-blind, saline placebo- and active-controlled, multicenter study to evaluate the analgesic efficacy and safety of HTX 011 administered via local administration into the surgical site in subjects undergoing bunionectomy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Area Under the Curve (AUC) of the Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) Pain Intensity Scores With Activity (NRS-A) Through 72 Hours Postsurgery (AUC0-72), Compared With Saline Placebo.
